title: Drawing, "Elevation of a church for Monte Vergine"

Drawing, "Elevation of a church for Monte Vergine".
Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, red ink. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-1145.
